articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Trump tariffs help push Jeep owner Stellantis into massive $2.7 billion loss - Fortune
articles.description: The €2.3-billion ($2.7-billion) net loss in the first half of the year came as sales in North America continued to slump.
articles.content: Jeep owner Stellantis said on Monday it suffered a massive loss in the first half of the year, when it felt the first impact of new US tariffs and took a massive charge following a change in US laws.… [+2926 chars]
